etomica.models.nitrogen

Class MeterDirectInitPert

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.data.DataSourceScalar
      • etomica.models.nitrogen.MeterDirectInitPert
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataSource, IEtomicaDataSource

    public class MeterDirectInitPert
extends DataSourceScalar
    Meter used for overlap sampling in the target-sampled system. The meter measures the ratio of the Boltzmann factors for the reference and target potentials.
